description: Try our easy to follow Stir-Fried Ginger Prawns With Snow Peas recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Stir-Fried Ginger Prawns With Snow Peas Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 750g green prawns, peeled, deveined, tails intact
4 cm piece ginger, peeled, finely shredded

recipeInstructions.text: Combine stock, soy, sesame oil, cornflour and garlic in a jug. Heat a wok over high heat. Add 1 tbs oil and ginger. Stir-fry ginger for 2 minutes or until golden. Reserve 2 tbs of the spring onion, add remainder to wok with capsicum and stir-fry for 2 minutes or until just tender. Transfer to a bowl.

Reheat wok and remaining oil. Stir-fry prawns in batches for 2 minutes until just cooked. Add sauce and bring mixture to the boil. Return vegetables to wok with snow peas. Cook for 2 minutes or until hot. Spoon rice onto serving plates and top with stir-fry and reserved spring onion.
